title: Innocent Bystander
description: The longest Nicki book is also the sexiest!Nicki, now disillusioned, realizes that she is but a tiny cog in a big machine, and she begins to feel like she’s going to be swallowed up. As she opens her eyes to all that’s around her, her life begins to fall apart. She loses her car, her apartment, and almost loses her job, all to circumstances beyond her control, and the bad guys have nothing to do with it. But, through adversity, Nicki learns what she’s made of. She begins to dig deep into the underbelly of Winchester, and she finds that the drug trade isn’t just for the junkies.Keep a fan nearby 'cause this Nicki book is hot, hot, HOT!!!Warning: Not for the faint of heart! This book contains explicit sex and naughty language. Proceed with caution...if you dare.
author: Jade C. Jamison
